title: Spiders
brief_description: The life-cycle of the nursery-web spider and habits and characteristics of the orb-web, funnel-web and trap-door spiders. A microscopic study of a spiral web, and close-ups of its spinning, together with scenes of spiders attacking, stinging and ensnaring insects are shown.
